Shivah/Seven-batp robes::

"Then you have gave me some reasons to kill her: first. your friends 
and you was allies of MAximals and we're mortal enemies to maximals. 
Second. you sent your spies and like spies they will die... if they 
aren't death right now."said Shivah "and you INTRUDER, I you have 
three seconds to decide you fate and Silverscout's, gave me that 
antivirus and she and you won't die today!!! "

The bats probes, who were outside scanning Lunarpine's signature 
hidding around the area, letting the externals defences of 
BlackFortress imed against him.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> (according to the sensors Foxfingers and Razor Claw already had a 
miserable death, Foxfingers is useing a dampening field to make them 
invisable to the scanners.)
> 
> Lunarpine answered Shivahs comment with "You're partly right, I was 
at one point a Maximal, now my loyalties are to my friends as an 
independant." he knew he was pushing his luck but he'd always been 
stubborn enough to push until it pushed back. "As for the anti-virus, 
it is ours and will remain with us until we see Silver Scout exit." 
He knew it was in the Predacons best interests to keep Silver Scout 
alive, especially if any Preds were infected.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Airshadow Nightlight 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Monday, August 13, 2001 12:06 PM
>   Subject: Ender/Mutants/Waitting/Blaze/Silverscout
> 
> 
>       Shivah said to Ender "Over that factions (Alliance and 
Destrons) who are the best to get an alliance? "after that the male 
opend his comm link to Blaze and Silverscout "Blaze and Silverscout, 
go to area 23" and looking to Drillbit "As soon as I end to deal with 
this pest, we can continue our businness "
> 
>       Shiva opened com link with Lunarpine "Why don't you give us 
the anti-virus and later we can chat about Silverscout?  if you don't 
do it I will kill her together your two friends that I've have in my 
hands"
> 
>       BlackFortress External defences turned on and aimed to 
Lunarpine; the room where Razor Claws and Foxfingers were, the acyd 
level started to increase.
> 
>       "I've told you Lunarpine of MAximals -Yes I know that you 
have been in Maximal base due that I give you that name" said 
Shivah "I told you that I haven't humour this day, unless you give me 
that antivirus to cure Silverscout... You and your friends are going 
to die with a horrible death!!!!"
